categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Xfere Lyoon was a Miraluka male Jedi Master stationed on Balmorra during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Xfere Lyoon appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as his character was cut from the game. Xfere Lyoon's file can be found on Jedipedia.
